sentence: Polls have consistently shown former Detroit Police Chief James Craig leading the Republican field, but with nowhere near majority support.
author: Paul Egan
title: Michigan's primary ballot may be 'disaster' for GOP candidates for governor, expert says

sentence: LANSING Former Detroit Police Chief James Craig, once the consensus front-runner in the Republican race for governor, has not filed enough valid signatures to make the August primary ballot, according to a report released late Monday by the Bureau of Elections.
author: Paul Egan
title: State elections report: James Craig and Perry Johnson filed too few signatures for ballot
